original_title: WBO Welterweight Manny Pacquiao Vs Miguel Cotto
overview: Manny Pacquiao vs. Miguel Cotto, billed as Firepower, was a boxing match for the WBO welterweight championship. The bout was held on November 14, 2009, at the MGM Grand Garden Arena, in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States.
title: WBO Welterweight Manny Pacquiao Vs Miguel Cotto
